name: Craft crafting table
goal: Craft a crafting table from planks
notes: The crafting table provides a 3x3 crafting grid, required for most recipes beyond basic planks and sticks. Any 4 planks work (can even mix wood types). Can be crafted in the 2x2 player crafting grid. Place the crafting table on the ground to use it. You can pick it back up by breaking it. Keep one in your inventory at all times.

steps.title: Obtain planks
steps.details: You need 4 planks of any type. Craft from logs if needed (1 log = 4 planks). Any wood type works and you can mix types.
checks: Have at least 4 planks in inventory

steps.title: Craft the crafting table
steps.details: Place 4 planks in a 2x2 square in the player's crafting grid. No existing crafting table needed. Recipe: { "recipe": "crafting_table", "count": 1 }.
